title: Deepresearcher: Scaling deep research via reinforcement learning in real-world environments
authors: Lyumanshan Ye, Hao Jin, Qiao Jin
description: The first comprehensive framework for end-to-end training of LLM-based deep research agents through scaling reinforcement learning (RL) in real-world environments with authentic web search interactions.

title: Colin: A Multimodal Human-AI Co-Creation Storytelling System to Support childrenâ€™s Multi-Level Narrative Skills
authors: Lyumanshan Ye, Jiandong Jiang, Yuhan Liu, Yihan Ran, Pengfei Liu, Danni Chang
description: An interactive storytelling tool that supports children's multi-level narrative skills through both voice and visual modalities.

title: Ghost of the past: identifying and resolving privacy leakage from LLM's memory through proactive user interaction
authors: Shuning Zhang, Lyumanshan Ye, Xin Yi, Jingyu Tang, Bo Shui, Haobin Xing, Pengfei Liu, Hewu Li
description: MemoAnalyzer, a system for identifying, visualizing, and managing private information within memories.

authors: Tao Long, Katy Gero, Lydia Chilton
description: Adanonymizer, an anonymization plug-in that allows users to control this balance by navigating a trade-off curve.

title: Olympicarena: Benchmarking multi-discipline cognitive reasoning for superintelligent ai

authors: Lyumanshan Ye, Hao Jin, Qiao Jin

title: Patterns for representing knowledge graphs to communicate situational knowledge of service robots
